item.description:
Let's Hike......Cascade Falls trail to Mt Ascutney
Edit Cancel Feature Copy Ticket Export Tell a friend NEW! Share
All members can edit
Sunday, April 21, 2013
10:00 AM

Mount Ascutney, Weathersfield Trailhead
Cascade Falls Rd off hwy 131
take I91 exit 8, head west
Ascutney, VT (edit map)

Details to follow: this is my home town hike and you are welcome to come over after the hike or we can get pizza at Rumunto's.

This mountain has natural water springs- it wouldn't surprise me if it still had ice on the rocks- so pack the microspikes

Poor weather will cancel a hike, but we can still get together for a non hiking event.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Hike......Cascade Falls trail to Mt Ascutney
